Nerangs.ab: ēsm ud bōy ēk tāg az dašn bē nihādan hōm pad kamistīh sē tāg ud urwarām pārag-ē nihādan barəsmana paiti.bərəta ...
"He should place one piece of ēsm ud bōy at the right side. He should place at least three twigs of hōm and a portion of urwarām (and they should recite) barəsmana paiti.bərəta ..."
ēsm ud bōy ēk tāg nihādan barəsmana. paiti.bərəta ...
"He should put one piece of ēsm and bōy (and they should recite) barəsmana paiti.bərəta ..."

Quotations.ab: pad hōmāst bun ēsm ud bōy ēw tāg az dašn bē nihišn u-š hōm ud urwarām pad čandīh bē paydāgēnišn hōm pad kamistīh sē grih ud pad wēšištīg panǰ. ṣ̌ōpaθ pad dwāzdah hōmāst-ē tašt-ē enyā urwarām ī andar ān pad nēmag u-š hamē xwarišn

"At the beginning of the Hōmāst, he should put a piece of ēsm and bōy on the right side. He has to show the hōm and urwarām in the following quantity: hōm, at least three "knots" and at most… (unclear). For the Dawāzdah-Hōmāst, (thes use) only a saucer. The urwarām in it is a half. He has to drink the whole."
